author: DarwinJS
body:
In times past 32-bit packages were not provided for Windows 8 and 10.

There is now one installer for 32-bit Windows and I'm wondering if it is intended for and has been tested on 32-bit Windows 8.1 and Windows 10?

Also if it is NOT intended for these platforms, does the package do an OS check and block itself from being installed?

Thanks,
D.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @DarwinJS Sorry for the late reply. I have smoke tested it on Win8 and 10 on x86. It seems to work fine. Please file issues if you see any.

title: Does the Windows 32 Bit Package Support Win 8 and Win 10?
